      参数类型为Pets的petGame中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void Players.addPet(Pets pet)
      store the pet into the list we set.
      static void Game.checkInfo(Pets pet)
      This method is use for check information of pets.
      static void Game.deadOrRebirth(Players player, Pets pet)
      This method check dead Or do Rebirth. print warning message to player.
      static void Game.fedPet(Players player, Pets pet)
      This method is use to feed pet. and Random events can happen when eating.
      static void Game.misbehave(Pets pet)
      This method use to check is it misbehavior. print warning message to player.
      static void Game.playPet(Players player, Pets pet)
      This method is use to play with pet using toys.
      void Pets.printInfo(Pets pet)
      This method is Print information and current value.
      static void Game.sick(Players player, Pets pet)
      This method use to check is pets get sick. print warning message to player.
      static void Game.sleepPet(Players player, Pets pet)
      This method is pets go to sleep.
      static void Game.toiletPet(Players player, Pets pet)
      This method is pets go to toilet.
